Office: 2053 McKelvey HallEmail: baruah[at]wustl[dot]eduPhone: (+1) 314-935-7546 I am affiliated with the Centre for Trustworthy AI in CPS Miss Brinklow, however, was not yet to be sidetracked. “What do the lamas do?”“They devote themselves, madam, to contemplation and to the pursuit of wisdom.”“But that isn’t doing anything.”“Then, madam, they do nothing.”James Hilton, Lost Horizon
